title: @KateyKhaos Or ANYONE Game-Breaking Bug
body:
Okay, so the client's loading up fine, i go into play, select draft pick(even bots)
Aaaaand It drops me into a black screen which is queue. I cannot select anything, and will eventually be kicked from queue for not selecting a champion. I'm not attempting to fix this again, just uninstall/reinstall, but PLEASE can you say how I could fix this by altering the files if it ever happens again?

replies.body:
Hey Akenero,

We're aware of this issue and are actively working to resolve this ASAP.

Thank you very much!
would that have to do with the "unexpected platform error"?

Of course!

I'm not 100% sure. It looks like the feature may not have been implemented fully just yet. (I'm guessing here - this isn't something I personally worked on.)

I'm getting issues when i click the following, Purchase RP, Icons, Skins. What happens is it say the game has stopped working and just completely closes. Also i cant play because when i get into a queue when it finds a game it crashes and i don't have a chance to see the accept/decline buttons. I tried a client repair but still no luck. Also another issues i am having is in the last patch after most games the client would not open so i had to click the RIOT icon in the bottom right and it opens the game then says the Mastero client crashed.

Hmmm. Okay. This is a bit out of my realm of expertise. Would you mind shooting this over into [Help & Support](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M)? We have Wrenchmen over there who are great at troubleshooting issues!

Hey! 
I was getting the "mastero" issue as well. It was caused by pinning your league client to the taskbar. When I unpinned League, and then pinned it to the task bar again it was fixed. 
Hope this helps.

I have this bug too; one thing you can do is press tab until you get to the chat box in order to tell your team what happened.

Also, if you manage to get into a game that's not blurred yet make sure you pick your champ before clicking ANYTHING else.
Change masteries second (they bug out less).  

**IMPORTANT:** Change **_a_** summoner spell last; you only get to change ONE so pick carefully.  
It will bug upon pressing the box.
The screen will then blur, but at least you'll get into the game.

You'll need to restart the client to reset it after the game though, end game screen will be blurry too (I think you can tab to chat here too; not sure).

-LostFr0st
